review_blob: This was just ok, nothing special at all. Aroma was quaint and light. Taste was too malty, not enough hops for me. It didnt even really taste much like an IPA to me, more like a regular old pale ale. There are better beers out there. Maybe a good intro IPA to a friend that knows nothing but BMC.
Tried this at a local restaurant. It was smooth and crisp with a great hoppy bitter aftertaste just like I like it. Great IPA for summer time.. This is a new favorite of mine.
beer_name: Lagunitas A Little Sumpin Sumpin Ale

review_blob: I first tried this beer at the Oregon Brewfest in 2010 and I fell in love. For me it is the perfect IPA. Nice hop aroma and extremely smooth well-balanced taste. Drinking this on draft gives me a beergasm every time and its hard for me to stop drinking it once I start. Purely delicious.
